scripts.fmt: prettier --write "**/*.md" && node scripts/md-format-sql-fences.js && node scripts/md-dedupe-fences.js && prettier --write . && markdownlint -q "**/*.md" || true
scripts.fmt:check: prettier --check "**/*.md" && node scripts/md-format-sql-fences.js --check && node scripts/md-dedupe-fences.js --check && markdownlint "**/*.md"

simple-git-hooks.pre-commit: npm run fmt && npm run lint
